.flex, footer .under-bottom, footer .bottom .persons-list, footer .bottom, footer .middle .footer-menus, footer .middle, #data .row .section-content .cities-list, #data .row .section-content .states-list, #reasons .section-content .right .reasons-list li .list-item .item-icon, #reasons .section-content .right .reasons-list li .list-item, #reasons .section-content, #partners .partnets-list, #map-widget .section-content .content-block, #products .products-list li .list-item .item-icon, #products2 .products-list li .list-item .item-icon, #main .section-content .served-info, #main .section-content .tab-content .tab-pane form, #main .section-content .nav-tabs, header .user-menu .menu-list, header .right {

  display: -o-flex;
  display: flex;
}

  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

}

}

}

}

.button {
  border: 0;
  outline: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.button.blue {
  background: #3173E9;
  padding: 15px 35px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: #ffffff;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}
.button:hover {
  box-shadow: 0px 5px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

.section-title {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 37px;
  line-height: 76px;
  color: #354052;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 38px;
  line-height: 56px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

  line-height: 28px;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}

  text-align: center;
}

  line-height: 24px;
  color: #354052;
  opacity: 0.8;
  margin-bottom: 43px;
}

  text-align: center;
}

}

#main {
  background: url(../images/main/bg.png) no-repeat center top, linear-gradient(199.23deg, rgba(49, 115, 233, 0.2) 0%, rgba(49, 115, 233, 0.1) 100.74%);
  min-height: 660px;
  padding-top: 177px;
  position: relative;
}
#main::before {
  content: " ";
  background: url(../images/main/bg.svg) no-repeat center;
  width: 500px;
  height: 700px;
  background-size: contain;
  position: absolute;
  right: 15%;
  bottom: -75px;
  display: none;
}
#main::after {
  content: " ";
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FFFFFF 5%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0001) 100%);
  transform: matrix(1, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0);
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  height: 184px;
  z-index: 3;
}
#main .section-content {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 4;
}

  position: relative;
  width: 354px;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

  content: " ";
  height: 1px;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: #9A9FA8;
  border-radius: 3.5px;
  opacity: 0.2;
}

  position: relative;
  width: 33.3%;
}

  text-align: center;
  padding: 0 15px 12px 15px;
  display: block;
}

  text-align: right;
}
#main .section-content .nav-tabs .nav-item a.nav-link {
  background: none !important;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 0 0 12px 0;
  line-height: 20px;
  color: #354052;
  opacity: 0.5;
  border: 0;
}

  content: " ";
  height: 2px;
  border-radius: 3.5px;
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  background: transparent;
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

  background: none !important;
  border: 0;
  opacity: 1;
}
#main .section-content .nav-tabs .nav-item a.nav-link.active::after {
  background: #3173E9;
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

}

}

}

}

  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

  content: " ";
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;

  background-size: contain;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  right: 5%;
  bottom: 0;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity ease-in-out 0;
}

  background-color: #ffffff;
  opacity: 1;
  transition: background-color ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

  opacity: 1;
  transition: all ease-in-out 0.25s;
}

  opacity: 1;
  transition: opacity ease-in-out 0.25s;
}
